title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 won’t have a bigger battery, but the inner screen will be wider
content:
As the foldable market gets more competitive, Samsung will need to improve its own offering. According to a couple of new reports, Samsung is planning to have a wider screen for the Galaxy Z Fold 4, but it won’t have better battery life from the looks of it.
